title: LuLu distributes 5,000 Iftar food packages
content: MORE than 5,000 Iftar food packages were distributed at five locations by LuLu Hypermarket as part of its annual ‘Joy of Giving’ Ramadan corporate social responsibility (CSR) programme. This year’s locations included near the Bab Al Bahrain police station in Manama, in front of the post office in Muharraq, Riffa suq and two labour camps .  You Might Like
